subject: Jury System
Decisions and Verdicts
Perjury
Steroids
Baseball
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors must decide this week whether to retry Barry Bonds on several charges, while his lawyers are expected to ask a judge to overturn the jury’s verdict.
snippet: Prosecutors must decide this week whether to retry Barry Bonds on several charges, while his lawyers are expected to ask a judge to overturn the jury’s verdict.
